title: Superstar
concept: I wanted to keep this pair minimalistic and let the colors do it’s thing.

title: Air 空軍
brief: I wanted some Air Forces with a simple color palette.
concept: I’ve always liked the orange and black combo. And I think the orange pops pretty good on these. «Air» on the sides of the kicks, and «Air Force» in Japanese on the front.
images: Air Force final front – 空軍
Air Force WIP – Nike swoosh removal
Air Force WIP – paintin 空軍

title: Hong Xing 洪兴
brief: Make some custom kicks with his name on.
concept: I painted his name in Chinese on the front and his name romanized on the sides. My girlfriend did the outline for the Chinese characters, and painted two well known buildings from their hometown Changsha on the insides of the shoes.

title: Lukas
concept: No brief for these, just 'do your thing'. Didn't really mean to do the LA Lakers color theme, but yellow and purple goes really well together 🤷🏻‍♂️. First time trying out this splatter technique.
images: Lukas final on top of shoe box

title: Ye Mi’an 晔 密
brief: For our second date we went to a sneaker store to pick out some kicks I could paint on.
concept: These were my first ever custom sneakers. My girlfriend wanted her and her mothers name on some kicks, and I suggested to add her hometown – Changsha, and the place she calls home now – Oslo.
images: Ye Mi'an final on feet model full body shot

title: Sweet
brief: Ye wanted sprinkles on some kicks.
concept: My girlfriend wanted sprinkles on her kicks. Sprinkles are usually put on sweet things. So I drew the word «sweet» and some goodies you would put sprinkles on.

title: Jøran 尤燃
concept: Went with my classic Chinese and romanized name on each sneaker, and some vibrant splashes for the background.
images: Nike swoosh cut of a sneaker.
Jøran letters painted on white sneaker.
尤燃 painted on black sneaker.
Vibrant orange and blue splashes on black sneakers.
Close up of MH leather name tag on sneaker.
Orange splashes on the back of two sneakers.

title: Studio Ghibli
brief: Trying out characters on some kicks.
concept: I've loved the movies from Studio Ghibli for many years. So when choosing what characters would be my first on a pair of sneakers the choice was pretty easy. On the sneakers you'll find characters from the movies Spirited Away, My Neighbor Totoro, Princess Mononoke, Ponyo and Kiki's Delivery Service.
images: Princess Mononoke and Totoro on the front of each shoe.
White forest character from Princess Mononoke.
Chihiro and No Face from Spirited Away

title: 莫童
concept: My first customs made out of something that's not leather. Messed up a bunch of times, but the final result is my name in Chinese on the front of these classics.
images: 莫童 WIP black spray paint
莫童 WIP black yellow spray paint

title: Vue.js
concept: Vue themed sneakers. Vue.js is the first JavaScript framework I learned, so I wanted to give something back to it's creator – Evan You.
images: Back of shoe – Nike Air logo

title: Fan Yi
concept: Fan Yi wanted something cute an festive. I drew her name, some baloons, lots of small dots and some splatter. Design of the chinese characters done by my girlfriend.

title: 莫童
brif: Just wanted another pair with my Chinese name.
concept: I've started to enjoy drawing my name in Chinese. Kept the color palette and effects minimal and added som drips.
